title: TabLayout Tabs Text Not Displaying
body:
The problem is you're calling TabLayout.setupWithViewPager() after you've set up your tabs by calling addTab() on your TabLayout instance.

From the documentation of setupWithViewPager():

This method will link the given ViewPager and this TabLayout together so that changes in one are automatically reflected in the other. This includes scroll state changes and clicks. The tabs displayed in this layout will be populated from the ViewPager adapter's page titles.

If you would like to use your TabLayout with a ViewPager, you should override getPageTitle() in your PagerAdapter (and remove the addTab() calls, they are redundant).

For example:

public class PagerAdapter extends FragmentStatePagerAdapter {

    // an array of tab titles
    private String[] tabTitles = new String[]{"Tab1", "Tab2", "Tab3"};

    public PagerAdapter(FragmentManager fm) {
        super(fm);
    }

    // overriding getPageTitle()
    @Override
    public CharSequence getPageTitle(int position) {
        return tabTitles[position];
    }

    @Override
    public Fragment getItem(int position) {

        switch (position) {
            case 0:
                return new FragmentTab1();
            case 1:
                return new FragmentTab2();
            case 2:
                return new FragmentTab3();
            default:
                return null;
        }
    }

    @Override
    public int getCount() {
        return tabTitles.length;
    }
}
